channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Sarah & Duck
channel.desc: Paisley Sea. Animation. Sarah and Duck think they are headed to the zoo, but the bus takes a surprising diversion.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: The Moon Whale. Animation about a family of small creatures who live on, and inside, a planet. The Clangers are visited by a rare, strange and beautiful creature - a moon whale.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: BeddyByes
channel.desc: Hug. MeMo and BaBa play with a cuddly teddy bear and all their BeddyByes friends. They discover that when you are feeling sad, sometimes all you need is a hug to make things better.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Upsy Daisy Kisses Everything. Series for young children. Upsy Daisy loves the garden so much that she kisses everything around her. When she kisses things, magic starts to happen.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Gaz Coombes - Octopants: The Missing Pirate Pants. Join Gaz Coombes on an underwater quest. for pirate underwear.
